message: How to use the Dramatica in short stories (style Alan Poe)? Has anyone here ever done it? Can cite examples?

I don't know much about this, but they talk about "slicing and dicing" (which I think means exploring just one layer of the theme browser) and doing something like exploring a single column straight down.

I examined a short film once, and if you squinted, you could see the faintest impression of a full storyform. But barely!
Here is a link to a Dramatica tip on writing short stories:  http://dramatica.com/theory/tip_of_month/tips/tip0904.html
